content: Phase 2 Backend: Complete backend architecture with all models, routes, agents scaffolds
Phase 2 Backend: Auth system with JWT (register, login, refresh, me)
Phase 2 Backend: Plan generation pipeline with simplified multi-agent flow
Phase 2 Backend: Subscription tier checking and usage limits
Phase 2 Backend: PDF export with ReportLab
Phase 2 Frontend: Core pages (Home, Auth, Dashboard, Intake Wizard, Plan Editor)
Phase 2 Frontend: Key components (PlanCard, SectionEditor, WizardSteps)
Phase 2 Frontend: API integration layer with error handling
Phase 2: Integration testing of critical path user journey
Phase 2: Fix critical bugs and validate core flows
